The presence of this truck suggests that it could become an obstacle if the ego car intends to change lanes to overtake the cement mixer.

Further ahead, there is a green truck with a cargo area also covered by a green tarp, traveling in the same direction ahead of the red-and-blue truck. This green truck must be taken into consideration by the ego car for any potential lane changes and to maintain safe following distances.
